translations: 风景优美的；观光的；舞台布景的；（画）描绘事件的

sentences.sentence: I pulled off the road at a scenic overlook.
sentences.translation: 在一个可以眺望优美风景的地方，我将车停在了路旁。

sentences.sentence: This is an extremely scenic part of America.
sentences.translation: 这是美国风景极其优美的一个地区。

sentences.sentence: She would be able to visit more scenic spots.
